name: ChristmasSector
description:
Christmas Sector is Christmas themed version of Dead Sector. Humanity is dependent on a Christmas Gifts. Enter the depths of the Christmas Sector and find out why more and more underground gifts get lost. Fight against mysterious creatures and use their presents to charge your sugary weapon.

Important Note: Some GPUs are not compatible with the experimental "Sugar-Texture" feature. Press the "B" on you Keyboard to disable it, if you experience frame drops or crashes on Attack.

Controls The Demo is optimized for the XBox Gamepad, but you can use the following Keys if you prefer Mouse and Keyboard.

W,A,S,D = Movement
LMB = Light Attack, 
RMB = Heavy Attack 
R = Recharge Health (require one E-Cell)
Space = dodge
Tab = Lock-On Enem
Q or E switch between Targets
Ctrl (hold) = Run  
i = Invert Camera-Y-Axis
B = disable experimental Texture

HARDWARE RECOMMENDATIONS: 
CPU: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5GHz / AMD A10-7800 APU 3.5 GHz or better. GPU: GeForce 970 Series or better.
RAM: 4 GB. HDD: 7 GB
